name: Domino Domination
description:
Controls -----------------------

Move Camera: WASD

Rotate Camera: Q & E

Tilt Camera: Mouse Wheel (when not showing a piece)

Zoom Camera: Shift + Mouse Wheel

Show Piece: Right Mouse Button

Rotate Piece: Mouse Wheel

Emplace Piece: Left Mouse Button

----------------------------------------------------------------

Domino Domination was made for Mini Jam 104, with the theme of CASCADE and the limitation of FINITE QUANTITY!

Place dominos on the playfield to make a path to the end points! Be careful - you'll only have so many to use for all the levels!

Feedback always appreciated, and thanks for playing!
